content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the binx kitty hat a fun and quirky cat ear hat this hat uses simple half_double_crochet stitches and is made from a rectangle making it a quick and easy project this pattern includes instructions for adult size 21 5 -24 head circumference and child size 18 -21 head circumference +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 250 yards or less of size 4 worsted weight yarn depending on size *size i 5 5 mm crochet hook *stitch markers *yarn needle
